DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Ubiquinone Combined Antioxidant Therapy Non-proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator interested demonstrate efficacy Ubiquinone combine antioxidant therapy pharmacological management diabetic retinopathy since early stage .
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus Patients non proliferative diabetic retinopathy Glycated hemoglobin < 12.0 % Signing informed consent Patients clinically significant macular edema Patients diabetic retinopathy advance lesion require require specific treatment ( laser , vitrectomy ) Pretreatment argon laser excimer laser Ophthalmology surgery Any associate ocular pathology ( glaucoma , cataract , change cornea dystrophy , macular degeneration ) Pregnancy , lactation , inadequate use contraception Antioxidant drug and/or supplement six month previous enrollment Renal and/or hepatic failure Age 30 75 year Severe cardiovascular disease ( myocardial infarction , stroke , severe peripheral vasculopathy ) Blood dyscrasia Have cancer serious illness Neurodegenerative process Allergy vitamin
